QuestData.Title: The Only Way to Travel
QuestData.Description:
Portals? Teleportation? You bet I can help you out with that! I mean, how do you think I pull the rabbit out of...
...um, you didn't hear that.
Anyway, I can help you move your mages around, if the price is right. Heck I can even teach those combat mages a thing or two. Ever been on the receiving end of an exploding bunny? It ain't pretty!
For starters, let me whip up a portal to take us to this hall you're talking about.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Meryl Felstorm in the Hall of the Guardian.
QuestData.RewardText: I understand he may be unconventional, but I think this goblin is exactly what we'll need to quickly get this new Tirisgarde up to snuff for the task at hand.$B$BI've already sent word to many talented mages who can help. They await transportation to the Hall, where they can begin their new purpose.$B$BShall we?
